author: Emalee Grover

review: I like the fact that it doesn't need a separate power source other than plugging into the TV's usb outlet (and yest it come with the set), nor takes any additional space in front or above the TV. Works seamless with Netflix. I can play many YouTube videos via Chromecast that is installed on my Nexus 7 android tablet . No need for set top box like Roku box. You don't waste power at all, since the device turns on, when the TV is turned on. Best and most affordable streamer yet. Have used for several months now and happy with it.
author: Tsering

review: Love It. Why pay move for the others? If you stream Hulu and Netflix’s on your iPad or other device, you need this. I was a little apprehensive at first about this. Seeing how others are more expensive. If you want the basic into to turn your HD TV into a “smart TV: to stream movies or shows, this is it.Set up is EZ and fast. Plug it into an HDMI slot and within five minutes you’re streaming.

review: Turns my stupid bedroom TV into an almost-as-smart as my smart TV... TV. Youtube and Netflix work great. The music thing is a little janky but I never listen to music on my TV anyway. Basically you upload all of your music to "google play" and then google decides what you can legitimately play on your TV. Not sure why they didn't just allow you to stream directly to the unit but whatever its freakin $35. Buy it!
